title: 物業管理界呼籲8月5日全港三罷之聲明

replies.msg:
致各位香港市民：

香港開埠歷百餘載，今日所爆發之民憤前所未見。特區林鄭政府倒行逆施，逃犯條例修訂一意孤行，將社會各路義士勇士逼上街頭，引發莘莘學子以死相博，更甚逼到至少六名市民以死相諫。特區政府作為公僕，拒絕服務市民，是謂有違倫常。無奈此殺人政權不甘滿足於此，更挑動警員情緒，故意包庇失職，更與中聯辦合謀，勾結黑幫發動元朗鐵路站無差別攻擊，警鄉黑政合作，是謂有違天理。

吾等物業管理從業員，本職雖非除暴安良，但亦以保護市民性命財產為己任。

我們會保持專業操守，以守護市民財產及安全為由，拒絕沒有法庭搜查令或居民報警求助之警方進入管理範圍。仝工若然與虎謀皮，業界立即列入黑名單，永不錄用。現特區警察明知罪案發生，不僅以囂張態度應對市民查詢，更縱容襲擊市民，警署更關上大閘，所作所為皆令人神共憤，吾等作為同樣肩上保安職責之士，目睹對此等喪盡天良之惡行，吾等恥與為伍。

社會各界多番呼籲修例，特區政府視若無睹。應解決政治風波之時，卻被發現在香港各地出席社交場合，享受酒池肉林。而過百萬市民抵住烈日當空，走上街頭為香港自由與未來拼命。時至今日，特區政府歷經廿二載，多番向北京俯首稱臣，自我矮化，早已失格。失效議會更無法有效監察濫權瀆職等宵小之輩，若非廣大市民盡忠職守，所謂特區早已禮崩樂壞。

現吾等與廣大市民立於同一陣線，在此我們要求特區政府回應五大訴求:

1. 全面撤回送中惡法
2. 釋放所有被捕抗爭者
3. 成立獨立調查委員會，徹查警方濫權及721警黑勾結指控
4. 撤回暴動定性
5. 實行雙普選

並於二零一九年八月五日展開罷工，特此通知。

最後，政治與每位香港人息息相關，沒人能獨善其身。我們作為香港人，要守護自己的家園！


一班熱愛香港的物業管理從業員上

For the first time in over a century of history in Hong Kong, over a million angry Hong Kongers are found marching down the street. The SAR government has decided to neglect the public opinion, making thousands of our brave citizens voluntarily take the fight to the street, youths risking their lives for the cause and at least six citizens decide to pay the ultimate price for it. The Hong Kong SAR government as a body of public servants, are supposed to serve the citizens, but they did not, which is fundamentally immoral. Regrettably the regime did not stop here. They mobilised the foul-mouthed, manipulative constables onto political missions, purposely hide the crimes themselves have committed. Moreover, they orchestrated a terrorist plot against civilians with LOCPG and the triads in Yuen Long. The liaison between Hong Kong SAR government, Chinese government, the Police and Triads have shown they have zero remorse and an absolute disgrace.


We are a group of security officers from all over Hong Kong. It might not be our duty to confront or investigate crime, but we are here to also serve and protect our people. If there is anyone among us plotting any crimes, there is no ground whatsoever to resume trust on them. Now the Hong Kong Police have realised the plot, but not only responding queries in an appalling manner, but allowing the attacks to happen by shutting the gates of the police stations. We as people who also provide security services, are ashamed by all these horrific actions.

The society have been calling on a full withdrawal of the extradition law amendment bill, however the Hong Kong SAR Government  considers such sincere appeal nonsense. Instead of comforting the society from political arguments, they were spotted attending to luxury balls and luncheons, enjoying their wine and food, meanwhile millions of citizens were taking up the heat, fighting for our freedom and future. Over the 22 years of SAR rule, the Hong Kong SAR government have been nothing but a puppet to Beijing while the undemocratic legislature have also failed to do its duty to monitor the failing government. The prosperity of Hong Kong would have been long gone if not we, the citizen are committed to our duties.


Now we stand with people, to send an ultimatum to the SAR government:


1. Retract the extradition law amendment bill.

2. Establish an independent inquiry with broad regconition.

3. Release political prisoners and stop purging political dissidents.

4. Retract the label of riot.

5. Full democracy now.


We will go on strike on the 5th of August, this serves as a notice.
PM 工程部表示波已射
